QuestData.Title: Emerald Allies
QuestData.Description: The druids of Hyjal are not the only ones sworn to defend this land. The emerald dragons have once again become a powerful ally to our cause.$B$BSpeak to Alysra at the Ruins of Lar'donir, to the north, and see what you can do to help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Alysra at the Ruins of Lar'donir in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: My duties are here, viewing the enemy's movement from above, commanding our armies where they're needed.$B$BYour aid would be most welcome.
